nodes.text: Plan 82, also known as Shockwave, was an attack plan devised by Clone Force 99, aka the "Bad Batch". The tactic involved the use of impromptu shields and Electro Magnetic Pulse grenades to swiftly overwhelm larger forces of battle droids. They used it against an attacking force of droids in a canyon on the planet Anaxes after the LAAT gunship carrying them, Clone Marshal Commander Cody, Clone Captain Rex, ARC trooper Jesse, and clone medic Kix was shot down on a mission.
